tasks.name: Timeline Project Initiation
tasks.description: Start with a clear definition of what the Worker does, who the users are, and how requests are handled.
tasks.success_criteria: Project is defined and shared via README.md
tasks.unit_tests: Verify that the OFFICIAL PRD is present and in a standard location.

tasks.name: /v1/chat/completions
tasks.description: Implement the main chat completions endpoint for Cloudflare AI worker.
tasks.success_criteria: Endpoint returns OpenAI compatible responses and supports multi-provider routing.
tasks.unit_tests: Mocked requests verify correct routing, headers match, model switching.
